channel.title: Why do people hate Jews?
channel.description:
I think this is the question of the century or maybe the millenia...
Why do people hate Jews so much? From the Egyptians to the Germans all of them have given them "Das Boot"
What about them is unappealing to you, please reply with a democratic, educated and valid response, I don't want people going
"ITS THEIR VERY FUCKING EXISTENCE THAT PISSES ME OFF!"
I do not have any grudges against Jews, I pity them very much. If there is one thing I would change about them I would change their isolation from the world and perhaps encourage them not to be so skrimping.

item.title: Why do people hate Jews?

item.description:
@Pacit wrote:

[quote=“jackyjack, post:62, topic:8475”]i personaly dont care for any race i hate all races equaly. lol

i think people hate them because of their hair or because the person is a racist[/quote]
WHY!? WHY!? would the person be racist if he hates jews?
Jews are NOT a race.
I bet you agrees that if a white man hits a black guy it HAVE to be a hate crime.
Your so dumb. Build me a timemachine so i can kill your grandparents.

well.
Have personally been at Auschwitz, the guides didn’t know thing, counldn’t speak english and ignored questions I asked just because I earlier asked why they could say 6million died when there is no bodies.
The trial against the nazis was a joke, how you could possible accept a confession as a confession when the person was torture.

Simply they want us to feel guilty for “the biggest crime of humanity” build on confessions.

Fuck jews and fuck the state of israel.

item.title: Why do people hate Jews?
item.dc:creator: @Aukake Aukake
item.description:
@Aukake wrote:

[quote=“jackal1003, post:44, topic:8475”]its stereotyping,In America look at the majority gainst Mexicans,just because they are 3rd world and want to make a better living…Yet the US are snobs and thing…“Lets make a wall!keep them out for good!”

What about canadians?theres around 1million illegal canadian immigrants!

but hey,its george bush so…[/quote]

Seeing as this topic is two days dead I’ll go ahead with my offtopic rant.

It’s hard for even myself to understand the rage that I am overcome with when I read about you trying to justify those wetbacks coming over here. They are illegal, unkempt, uneducated, and they speak Spanish very loud in fast food joints, which aggravates me to no end.

They flat out bring down the community by leaving trash everywhere. Which I have theorized they do on purpose so that they create jobs for their friends.

As for the Canadians, at least, for the most part, they speak English! I hate having to press 1 for Spanish. This falls into the uneducated category. The Canadians also have a much easier time assimilating into American culture as they were founded by mainly the same background of people that founded America.

You know what I’m going to do about all of that? Seeing as I can’t legally kill them in such a way that I could make myself feel better I’m going to learn Spanish! No no no, they can’t learn English though! God forbid!

Read full topic
